page.title: 12Law and Order
page.content: A police beat officer's house and office are situated in Shenstone Wood End to the east of the area, this comes under the Divisional H.Q. at Lichfield. The beat policeman is responsible for constantly patrolling throughout the area, of which he has a very extensive knowledge and he is well acquainted with the inhabitants. The village Community Association is represented on the Police Consultative Committee which meets three times a year as a means of communication between the Committee and Police. It is hoped in the near future to investigate the desirability of a Community Watch to combat crime.
